name: part_000
file: tmp_【チラ見せ枠_NIGHT】ときのそら New Year’s Party 2026『Dreams in Motion』 [ko7ypXM_-yQ]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_000.mov

scenes.description: Intro wait screen with event title and performance information.
Credit sequence displaying the names of gift givers while the song 'Wait for me!' plays.

subtitles.original:
YouTube
★無料チラ見せ枠★
subtitles.english:
YouTube
★Free Sneak Peek Slot★

subtitles.original: 差し入れを贈ってくださった皆様、本当にありがとうございます！
subtitles.english: Thank you so much to everyone who sent gifts!

subtitles.original: なんであなたにはできないの？
subtitles.english: "Why can't you do it like everyone else?"

subtitles.original: なんてさ陰口言われたり
subtitles.english: Being talked about behind my back...

subtitles.original: 呆れられたり
subtitles.english: ...and being looked down upon.

subtitles.original: 口角下がるデイ・バイ・デイ
subtitles.english: The corners of my mouth sag, day by day.

subtitles.original: 電車は私を置き去りに
subtitles.english: The train leaves me behind,

subtitles.original: しちゃうし
subtitles.english: as it always does.

subtitles.original: 葉物野菜も
subtitles.english: Even the leafy vegetables...

subtitles.original: スピード速すぎだよね
subtitles.english: ...are moving way too fast.

subtitles.original: ありのままの素敵さだけじゃ足りないんだ (Wait for me!)
subtitles.english: Just being myself isn't enough anymore. (Wait for me!)

subtitles.original: 毎日死ぬほど頑張って
subtitles.english: Working myself to death every day,

subtitles.original: やっとここまで連れてきたんだ
subtitles.english: I've finally made it this far.

subtitles.original: あなたにはわからない
subtitles.english: You wouldn't understand.

subtitles.original: 分かってほしくない
subtitles.english: I don't want you to understand.

subtitles.original: 私の苦労も
subtitles.english: My struggles and efforts...

subtitles.original: 雲ひとつほどご存知ないでいてね
subtitles.english: I hope you remain completely unaware of them.

subtitles.original: きっとあなたにもできるはず
subtitles.english: "I'm sure you can do it too."

subtitles.original: なんてさ言うほど
subtitles.english: I don't want to be...

subtitles.original: 無責任にはなりたくない
subtitles.english: ...that irresponsible to say such things.

subtitles.original: それでも死ぬほど頑張って
subtitles.english: But even so, I worked myself to death,

subtitles.original: 駆ける値打ちはあると思った
subtitles.english: thinking it was worth the chase.

subtitles.original: 投げ出したくもなるよ
subtitles.english: There are times I want to throw it all away.

subtitles.original: でも諦めたくはない
subtitles.english: But I don't want to give up.

subtitles.original: 私の未来も
subtitles.english: My future,

subtitles.original: 失敗も全部
subtitles.english: and all my failures...

subtitles.original: 私だけのもの
subtitles.english: ...they belong to me alone.

subtitles.original: あなたにはわからない
subtitles.english: You wouldn't understand.

subtitles.original: 分かってほしくない
subtitles.english: I don't want you to understand.

subtitles.original: 私の苦労も
subtitles.english: My struggles and efforts...

subtitles.original: 雲ひとつほどご存知ないで
subtitles.english: I hope you remain completely unaware of them.

subtitles.original: 投げ出したくもなるよ
subtitles.english: There are times I want to throw it all away.

subtitles.original: でも諦めたくはない
subtitles.english: But I don't want to give up.

subtitles.original: 私の未来も
subtitles.english: My future,

subtitles.original: 失敗も全部渡さないよ
subtitles.english: and all my failures, I won't hand them over.

subtitles.original: 気づかない気づかないでいて
subtitles.english: Stay unaware, please stay unaware.

subtitles.original: 可愛いだけの私でいたい
subtitles.english: I just want to be the cute version of myself.
